text: Call program from within a browser without using a webserver
Is there a way to call a program (Python script) from a local HTML page?
I have a YUI-colorpicker on that page and need to send its value to a microcontroller via rs232.
(There is other stuff than the picker, so I can't code an application instead of an HTML page.
Later, this will migrate to a server, but I need a fast and easy solution now.
